credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Film aus Lateinamerika, Film Podium
description: Image of a black and white brick wall in background with a photograph of a man lightly superimposed on top. Text across top, in black, reads "Filmpodium." In foreground at left center, scribbles in red, orange and yellow with handwritten text in black, on top, which reads "Filme aus/ Lateinamerika." In bottom right, additional scribbles in red, orange and yellow with black text on top which reads "13 Okt - 15 Dez 1980" with additional date and time information following.
name: Poster
